title: Biometric Systems Market 2015 - 2020 Research Reports
text: Reprint DALLAS, July 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- RnRMarketResearch.com adds 2015 edition biometric systems market research reports covering global regions, 2020 forecasts, government biometric systems, next generation biometrics, biometric access control system and more. The complete Global Biometric Systems Market Report 2015 spread across 173 pages, profiling 10 companies and supported with 168 tables and figures is now available at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/global-biometric-systems-industry-report-2015-market-report.html . This is a professional and in-depth study on the current state of the biometric systems market that provides a basic overview of the industry including definitions, classifications, applications and industry chain structure. The Biometric Systems market analysis is provided for the international markets including development trends, competitive landscape analysis, and key regions development status. Development policies and plans are also discussed and manufacturing processes and cost structures analyzed. Biometric Systems industry import/export consumption, supply and demand figures and cost price and production value gross margins are also provided. This 2015 biometric systems market research focuses on global major leading industry players providing information such as company profiles, product picture and specification, capacity production, price, cost, production value and contact information. Upstream raw materials and equipment and downstream demand analysis is also carried out. The Biometric Systems market development trends and marketing channels are analyzed. Finally the feasibility of new investment projects are assessed and overall research conclusions offered. With 168 tables and figure to support the biometric systems market analysis, this report provides key statistics on the state of the industry and is a valuable source of guidance and direction for companies and individuals interested in the market. Companies profiled in this research include 3M, ZK, Morpho Safran Group, Suprema, Aware, HID Global Corporation, IrisGuard, NEC Saudi Arabia, Precise Biometrics AB and M2SYS. Order a copy of Global Biometric Systems Industry Report 2015 at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/contacts/purchase?rname=395809 . The next generation biometrics market is expected to reach $24.4billion in 2020, at a CAGR of 17.9% between 2015 and 2020, according to the second research titled Next Generation Biometrics Market by Application (Government, Military & Defense, Healthcare, Banking & Finance, Consumer Electronics, Travel & Immigration, and Security), Technology (Face Recognition, Fingerprint Recognition, Iris Recognition, Palm Recognition, Voice Recognition, Signature Recognition, Vein Recognition, and Others), Function (Contact and Non-Contact) & Geography ( North America , Europe , APAC, Row) - Global Forecast to 2020 . The biometrics system market for single-factor authentication is expected to grow at an estimated CAGR of 17.5% between 2015 and 2020. The North American market accounted for a market share of ~35% in 2014 and is estimated to grow at a CAGR of 17.7% between 2015 and 2020. The APAC region is expected to grow at the highest rate of 18.9% between 2015 and 2020. Key players in the biometrics system market and discussed in this research include Safran SA ( France ), NEC Corporation ( Japan ), 3M Cogent Inc. (U.S.), Cross Match Technologies (U.S.), Fulcrum Biometrics (U.S.), Thales SA ( France ), Bio-key International, Inc. (U.S.), Suprema Inc. ( South Korea ), Fujitsu Ltd. ( Japan ), Precise Biometrics AB ( Sweden ), and Secunet Security Networks AG ( Germany ). This next generation biometrics market research spread across 229 pages and supported with 69 tables and 80 figures is now available at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/next-generation-biometric-technologies-market-global-forecast-analysis-2012-2017-market-report.html . The this research titled Global Government Biometric Systems Market 2015-2025 provides readers with a detailed analysis of both historic and forecast global industry values, factors influencing demand, the challenges faced by industry participants, analysis of industry leading companies, and key news. It says global biometric systems market is estimated to value US$4.4 billion in 2015 and increase at a CAGR of 8.70% during the forecast period, to reach a peak of US$10.2 billion by 2025. The market is expected to be dominated by North America , followed by Asia-Pacific and Europe . Fingerprint recognition is expected to account for the largest share of expenditure in the global Government Biometric Systems market going forward, followed by facial recognition and Iris. In particular, this government biometric systems market research provides an in-depth analysis of: Global Government Biometric Systems market size and drivers : detailed analysis of the global Government Biometric Systems market during 2015-2025, including highlights of the demand drivers and growth stimulators for Government Biometric Systems. It also provides a snapshot of the spending and modernization patterns of different regions around the world. Recent developments and industry challenges : insights into technological developments in the global Government Biometric Systems market and a detailed analysis of the changing preferences of global Government Biometric Systems market departments around the world. It also provides trends of the changing industry structure and the challenges faced by the industry participants. SWOT analysis of global Government Biometric Systems market : analysis of the industry characteristics by determining the strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats faced by the global Government Biometric Systems industry. Global Government Biometric Systems market country analysis : analysis of the key markets in each region, providing an analysis of the key segments of the global Government Biometric Systems market industry expected to be in demand in each region. Major programs : details of the key programs in each segment, which are expected to be executed during the forecast period. Competitive landscape and strategic insights : analysis of the competitive landscape of the global Government Biometric Systems market. It provides an overview of key players, together with insights such as key alliances, strategic initiatives, and a brief financial analysis Complete Global Government Biometric Systems Market 2015-2025 report spread across 181 pages, providing competitive landscape overview for Precise Biometrics, HID Biometrics, 3M Cogent, Giesecke & Devrient (G&D), Gemalto, SecuGen Corp, Fujitsu, Computer Sciences Corporation, SUPREMA, Morpho, Cross Match Technologies, Inc., NEC Corporation, Smartmatic International Corporation, Vision-Box, S.A and XTec Incorporated is available at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/the-global-government-biometric-systems-market-2015-2025-market-report.html .
